:fire: *1.* *First and foremost*, please fill the volunteer form (*above*).
:face_with_monocle: *2.* Check the <https://airtable.com/shrwgNtBUAzuciV0j/tbl5Bqnjl3JRKD7qP|*Volunteer Opportunities page*> for open positions.
:hammer_and_wrench: *3.* Have manufacturing or prototyping resources? Please complete the <https://kik.to/tq|*Manufacturer Database form*> too.

:mag: *4.* _[Optional]_ Want to learn more? Read the detailed <https://docs.google.com/document/d/1O5vzovJIWzPQyBln4KiOaLThFtb9DqWuYr115_2AlEU/edit?usp=sharing|*onboarding guide*> of Helpful Engineering and check out our <https://airtable.com/shrZ8pIj3rV6BAqdq/tblaQ1M283TuaV2Im?blocks=hide|*current projects in the Project Gallery*>. Also, take a peek at our <https://docs.google.com/document/d/1uxPBapZFlxBCpPjn_qAJcRyFuwFp85K4WfOxB4xjZnU/edit|*communityâ€™s values*>.
:bulb: *5.* Want to start a new project? Talk about your idea on #discussion-new-projects and ask for a new channel at #new-channel-request.
